Direct Known Subclasses:
LocalPhptTestPackRunner, LocalPhpUnitTestPackRunner
public abstract class AbstractLocalTestPackRunner<A extends ActiveTestPack,S extends SourceTestPack<A,T>,T extends TestCase>
extends AbstractTestPackRunner<S,T>

Dynamic Thread Pooling: dynamically increases and decreases the number of threads used to run tests as slower or faster test are encountered to maximize cpu utilization.
